Views¶

class order.views.MyOrdersView(**kwargs)¶

A list of user’s orders view.

Displays a list of user’s orders, the total amount of each order.

Login required.

get_queryset()¶

Return the list of items for this view.

The return value must be an iterable and may be an instance of QuerySet in which case QuerySet specific behavior will be enabled.

paginate_by = 10¶
queryset = QuerySet¶
template_name = 'my_orders.html'¶
class order.views.OrderCreateView(**kwargs)¶

An order creation form view.

Displays an order creation form and creates a new order if form is valid.

Login required.

form_class¶

alias of OrderForm

form_valid(form)¶

Custom form validation function.

Raises:

BadRequest: If one of the products in the cart isn’t available an error is thrown.

get_context_data(**kwargs)¶

Insert the form into the context dict.

success_url = '/order/my_orders/'¶
template_name = 'order_create.html'¶
class order.views.OrderDetailView(**kwargs)¶

A detailed view of a specific user’s order.

Login required.

get(request, pk)¶
get_context_data(pk, *args, **kwargs)¶
template_name = 'order_detail.html'¶
class order.views.OrderProcessDetailView(**kwargs)¶

An order status update view.

Displays an order status update form and updates an order status.

Login required.

fields = ['status']¶
model¶

alias of OrderDetails

success_url = '/order/client_orders/'¶

class order.views.OrderProcessView(**kwargs)¶

A list of user’s products orders from other users.

Login required.

Return the list of items for this view.

The return value must be an iterable and may be an instance of QuerySet in which case QuerySet specific behavior will be enabled.
